name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, rich tomato sauce, and creamy vegan cheese baked to perfection.

name: Pizza
description: Crispy thin crust topped with vegan mozzarella, fresh veggies, and aromatic herbs.

name: Burger
description: Juicy plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo in a toasted bun.

name: Sandwich
description: Whole-grain bread filled with grilled veggies, hummus, and fresh greens.

name: Iced tea
description: Refreshing black tea brewed with lemon and mint, served perfectly chilled.

name: Lemonade
description: Zesty homemade lemonade made with fresh lemons and a hint of agave syrup.

name: Banana smoothie
description: Creamy banana blend with oat milk and a touch of cinnamon for natural sweetness.

name: Cake
description: Soft, moist vanilla sponge layered with smooth vegan buttercream frosting.

name: Chocolate mousse
description: Silky, rich chocolate mousse made with avocado and cocoa for a guilt-free treat.

name: Lemon cheesecake
description: Tangy lemon cheesecake with a crunchy oat crust and a smooth cashew cream filling.
